item.title: Predicting the possibility of escalation of care for specific cohorts admitted to ICU
item.description: To predict the possibility of escalation of care for specific cohorts admitted to Keck ICU,), on the following: Increase in pressors, Intubation, Trip to operating room within 24 hours, Starting dialysis The objective is to predict on a real-time/near real-time basis, whether someone is likely to require escalated care as defined above. Prediction of the likelihood of such a care escalation need is assumed to be an optional/secondary requirement at this stage.
